Content:
Vectarine

*Vectarine is a game engine with a focus on ultra fast prototyping, ease of use and having fun.* ## Goals by importance - Your time is valuable - Luau scripting: Instant reload and strong typing - Assets built into the engine for fast testing - Gallery of example: start with working templates - Powerful debugging tools: waste less time on bugs - Don't limit creativity - Access to low-level primitives - 3d & 2d support - Performance: Render millions of entities at 60 fps - Reach a wide audience - Supports the Web, Windows, Linux, MacOS - Distribute your game by sharing a zip with a small size footprint. - Free and open-source ## Getting started making games Download [the latest build](https://github.com/vanyle/vectarine/releases/latest) of the engine from the [releases](https://github.com/vanyle/vectarine/releases) page. Additionally, you'll need: - A text editor. I recommend [Visual Studio Code](https://code.visualstudio.com/), but you can use Notepad or anything really. - (Optional) Installing a Luau extension for your editor See **[The manual](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/vanyle/vectarine/main/./docs/user-manual.md)** for detailed information on how to make games with vectarine

Adicionalmente, necesitar谩s: - Un editor de texto. Recomiendo [Visual Studio Code](https://code.visualstudio.com/), pero puedes usar Notepad o cualquier otro. - (Opcional) Instalar una extensi贸n de Luau para tu editor Consulta **[El manual](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/vanyle/vectarine/main/./docs/user-manual.md)** para obtener informaci贸n detallada sobre c贸mo crear juegos con Vectarine

Content:
If you prefer watching rather than reading, there is a **[video presentation](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=KwckT9mbj10)** to get started.

Feel free to join our [Discord server](https://discord.gg/zPwg3VDydz) if you have any questions or want to chat with other developers.

Below are information on how to work and improve the engine.

## Helping out on the engine

There are plenty of ways to contribute to the engine!

### You can improve the documentation

- You can document individual functions inside `luau-api`
- You can clarify and add sections of [the manual](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/vanyle/vectarine/main/./docs/user-manual.md)
- You can add new examples to the [gallery](./gallery/)

### You can change the engine itself

- You can improve the editor
- You can add new APIs to the runtime

See [CONTRIBUTING](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/vanyle/vectarine/main/./CONTRIBUTING.md) for technical information on the engine

We have many features planned in [the TODO List](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/vanyle/vectarine/main/./TODO.md), so you can just pick good first issues if you want to help!

### You can take part in the community

We have a [Discord server](https://discord.gg/zPwg3VDydz) where you can discuss features and get help from other developers

A continuaci贸n se muestra informaci贸n sobre c贸mo trabajar y mejorar el motor.

## Ayudando con el motor

隆Hay muchas formas de contribuir al motor!

### Puedes mejorar la documentaci贸n

- Puedes documentar funciones individuales dentro de `luau-api`
- Puedes aclarar y agregar secciones del [manual](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/vanyle/vectarine/main/./docs/user-manual.md)
- Puedes agregar nuevos ejemplos a la [galer铆a](./gallery/)

### Puedes cambiar el motor mismo

- Puedes mejorar el editor
- Puedes agregar nuevas APIs al runtime

Consulta [CONTRIBUTING](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/vanyle/vectarine/main/./CONTRIBUTING.md) para informaci贸n t茅cnica sobre el motor

Tenemos muchas funciones planeadas en [la lista TODO](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/vanyle/vectarine/main/./TODO.md), 隆as铆 que puedes elegir issues f谩ciles para comenzar si quieres ayudar!

### Puedes participar en la comunidad

Tenemos un [servidor de Discord](https://discord.gg/zPwg3VDydz) donde puedes discutir funciones y obtener ayuda de otros desarrolladores
